title: Not Launching
body:
Whenever I try to launch League i get a popup saying: 
PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working. A problem caused the program to stop working correctly. Windows will close the program and notify you if a solution is available.
 I've tried to re-install the game and restarting my pc, but it doesn't seem to be working. Is there something wrong with my PC or is it on server side? 
{{item:3070}} halp i wanna get back to promos{{item:3070}}

replies.body: This issue is usually due to an OS setting that's blocking the patcher from launching and scanning files.  I recommend following the instructions in our [Permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to fix this up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
